imdb.plot outline: A boy by the name of Timothy has just come to the Spiral. He is beginning his studies at the Ravenwood School of Magical Arts headed by Headmaster Merle Ambrose. As he arrives at Wizard City, he seems a bit anxious to begin, but at the same time frightened when he exits the headmaster's tower to see so many "evil spirits", as he calls them. Join Timothy on his adventure through the Spiral as he learns the arts of magic in attempting to become the greatest wizard of all time. Remember... attempting... there are no promises he will become this, but have hope! With a comedic script and a great story line it will have viewers coming back every episode wondering what's next.
imdb.title: New Student
plot: A boy by the name of Timothy has just come to the Spiral. He is beginning his studies at the Ravenwood School of Magical Arts headed by Headmaster Merle Ambrose. As he arrives at Wizard City, he seems a bit anxious to begin, but at the same time frightened when he exits the headmaster's tower to see so many "evil spirits", as he calls them. Join Timothy on his adventure through the Spiral as he learns the arts of magic in attempting to become the greatest wizard of all time. Remember... attempting... there are no promises he will become this, but have hope! With a comedic script and a great story line it will have viewers coming back every episode wondering what's next.::Daniel Deathcaster
